agentic_actions: Full web navigation via Operator (click/scroll/type); research workflows
freshness_scope: General web; can operate forms and multi-step tasks
release_highlights_2025: Operator research preview launched (Jan 2025); integrated web search with citations
limitations: Operator initially limited availability; research preview; sensitive actions may require user confirmation
best_for: Complex tasks requiring interaction with websites; end-to-end workflows
notes: Use for form-filling, bookings, exports; pair with Make/Zapier for scheduling and verification

citations_behavior: Provides direct citations when web data used
agentic_actions: Primarily search & synthesis; no full web navigation like Operator
freshness_scope: Pulls web results on demand when enabled
release_highlights_2025: Web search added (Mar 2025) for Claude 3.7 Sonnet
limitations: Feature limited to certain model/tier; not an agentic browser
best_for: High‑quality synthesis with sources; safer summaries
notes: Enable web search in profile; pair with automation for monitoring

agentic_actions: Search and summarize; actions roadmap (agents like ‘Mariner’ discussed)
release_highlights_2025: AI Mode announced/expanded at I/O 2025; visual search fan-out; Gemini 2.0 upgrades
limitations: Personalization may bias; execution/agent actions limited vs full agents
best_for: Real-time web/search coverage; local shopping/stock info
notes: Strong for multimodal/image queries; pair with orchestration for alerts

citations_behavior: Links vary; strong emphasis on real-time trends
agentic_actions: Tool-use via API (web_search, x_search); reasoning ‘Think’ modes
freshness_scope: Realtime trends and news via X; web integration
release_highlights_2025: Grok 4 released (Jul 2025); Tools GA incl. web_search/x_search (Oct 2025)
limitations: Source quality varies; not ideal as sole authority for prices
best_for: Trend sensing; monitoring live discourse and sentiment
notes: Use as early-signal layer; confirm with stable web sources

citations_behavior: Collects links per sub-agent; user composes final set
agentic_actions: Parallel sub-agents across large corpora; exportable results
freshness_scope: Hundreds of agents in parallel for breadth
limitations: Breadth over precision; needs dedup/verification pipeline
best_for: Large catalogs/market maps; bulk price scraping via agents
notes: Pair with Make/Zapier for dedup, normalization, and monitoring

agentic_actions: Limited web actions; focuses on multi-hop search and synthesis
freshness_scope: Dozens of searches; hundreds of sources per Deep Research run
release_highlights_2025: Deep Research launched (Feb 2025) delivering autonomous multi-hop reports
limitations: Less capable for logged-in flows/forms; requires external orchestration for actions
best_for: Fast, transparent answers with citations; landscape scans; price/news checks
notes: Great as the ‘source finder’; feed URLs to agentic tool or Make/Zapier

citations_behavior: Generates source-backed drafts; research previews and GitHub
freshness_scope: Depends on deployment; uses web search for curation
release_highlights_2025: Active OSS project; co-curation features; widely trialed
notes: Ideal when compliance requires OSS + auditability
